notes.text: Security update for freetype2
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
The font rendering library freetype2 has been updated to fix various 
security issues.

Security Issues:

    * CVE-2014-9656
      <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-9656>

notes.text: The tt_sbit_decoder_load_image function in sfnt/ttsbit.c in FreeType before 2.5.4 does not properly check for an integer overflow, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted OpenType font.

notes.text: The tt_face_load_hdmx function in truetype/ttpload.c in FreeType before 2.5.4 does not establish a minimum record size, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted TrueType font.
